title: What is a bar at the top of a screen called? - Quora

response.answer_text: On Android, it is officialy called the Status Bar.[1] Unofficially, it is sometimes referred to as the Notification Bar,[2] but this is somewhat inaccurate because it shows status (battery, time, cellular radio signal) in addition to icons representing various unread notifications. Footnotes[1] Notifications Overview  |  Android Developers[2] List of symbols in the notification bar
I believe that the the name is The Up in The Corner Pub Bar. They only serve high end micro beers and cocktails. I hear they you need to know someone that knows someone to get in, IDK.
